info.title: Work Analytics
info.description:
The Work Analytics API provides metrics related to call queues activity as well as agent activity on queues.
### **Time filtering**
If no time filtering is provided, the returned metrics reflect the agent activity in the last 24 hours. \
The reports can be generated for a specific date range, specified using 'startDate' and 'endDate' parameters, in ISO 8601 format. If a specific intra day time range is desired, the 'intraDayStart' and 'intraDayEnd', in ISO 8601 format, must be used.
### **Examples:**

  - To obtain a full day report from 1st of May to 5th of May, in UTC, use startDate: 2023-05-01T00:00:00Z and endDate: 2023-05-05T00:00:00Z. 
  - To obtain a report from 1st of May to 5th of May, in a specific time zone, starting from 8 AM to 6 PM, use startDate: 2023-05-01T00:00:00-0700 and endDate: 2023-05-05T00:00:00-07000, intraDayStart: 08:00:00-0700, intraDayEnd: 18:00:00-0700.

get.summary: Get Agent Activity Metrics per Queues
get.description: This endpoint returns the agent activity metrics for the selected pbx, grouped by queue and agent. The response can be further filtered by a list of queues, sites, agents, user or queue statuses. If no date range is provided, the metrics reflect the agent activity in the last 24 hours.

parameters.name: pbxId
parameters.description: Id of the PBX.

parameters.name: siteIds
parameters.description: Site ids filtering. Multiple values can be passed separated by comma. If not passed, all sites data for the given pbx will be returned.

parameters.name: queueIds
parameters.description: Call Queue ids filtering. Multiple values can be passed separated by comma. If not passed, all queues data for the given pbx will be returned.

parameters.name: userIds
parameters.description: User ids filtering. Multiple values can be passed separated by comma.

parameters.name: userStatuses
parameters.description: User statuses filtering. Multiple values can be passed separated by comma.

parameters.name: queueStatuses
parameters.description: Queue statuses filtering. Multiple values can be passed separated by comma.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Report start date in ISO 8601 standard. If startDate is entered, endDate is required as well.

Start date in U.S. Pacific Time time zon.description: 2023-06-14 start date in U.S. Pacific Time time zone

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Report end date in ISO 8601 standard. If endDate is entered, startDate is required as well.

End date in U.S. Pacific Time time zone.description: 2023-06-15 end date in U.S. Pacific Time time zone

parameters.name: intraDayStart
parameters.description: Report intra day start time (up to seconds) in ISO 8601 standard. If intraDayStart is entered, intraDayEnd is required as well. Report intraDayStart/intraDayEnd parameters should be passed only when report startDate/endDate are passed as well.

intra day start time in U.S. Pacific Tim.description: 8 AM in U.S. Pacific Time time zone

parameters.name: intraDayEnd
parameters.description: Report intra day end time (up to seconds) in ISO 8601 standard. If intraDayEnd is entered, intraDayStart is required as well. Report intraDayStart/intraDayEnd parameters should be passed only when report startDate/endDate are passed as well.

intra day end time in U.S. Pacific Time.description: 6 PM in U.S. Pacific Time time zone

parameters.name: metrics
parameters.description:
Expected metrics in response. Multiple values can be passed separated by comma.
**Values allowed and their description**
| Name                                  | Description                                                                                                                                     |
|---------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| missedInteractions                    | The number of interactions that were missed by the user.                                                                                        |
| rejectedInteractions                  | The number of interactions that were rejected by the user.                                                                                      |
| ongoingTalkingInteractions            | The number of interactions that are currently in the talking phase.                                                                             |
| rejectedInteractionsPercentage        | The percentage of interactions that were rejected by the user.                                                                                  |
| averageOnHoldInteractionsTime         | The average time that interactions were on hold.                                                                                                |
| ongoingOnHoldInteractions             | The number of interactions that are currently on hold.                                                                                          |
| userStatusTime                        | The total time the user has been in their current status.                                                                                       |
| missedInteractionsPercentage          | The percentage of interactions that were missed by the user.                                                                                    |
| ongoingWrapUpInteractionsTime         | The time spent on interactions that are currently in the wrap-up phase.                                                                         |
| ongoingAvgTalkingInteractionsTime     | The average time spent on interactions that are currently in the talking phase.                                                                 |
| enteredInteractions                   | The number of interactions that the user has entered into.                                                                                      |
| ongoingTotalHandlingInteractionsTime  | The total time spent on interactions that are currently being handled.                                                                          |
| acceptedInteractionsPercentage        | The percentage of interactions that were accepted by the user.                                                                                  |
| averageTalkingInteractionsTime        | The average time spent on interactions during the talking phase.                                                                                |
| totalInteractionTime                  | The total time spent on all interactions.                                                                                                       |
| ongoingHandlingInteractions           | The number of interactions that are currently being handled by the user.                                                                        |
| queueStatusTime                       | The total time the user has been in the queue status.                                                                                           |
| ongoingWrapUpInteractions             | The number of interactions that are currently in the wrap-up phase.                                                                             |
| ongoingAvgHandlingInteractionsTime    | The average time spent on interactions that are currently being handled.                                                                        |
| ongoingOnHoldInteractionsTime         | The time spent on interactions that are currently on hold.                                                                                      |
| ongoingTalkingInteractionsTime        | The time spent on interactions that are currently in the talking phase.                                                                         |
| averageWrapUpTime                     | The average time spent on interactions during the wrap-up phase.                                                                                |
| acceptedInteractions                  | The number of interactions that were accepted by the user.                                                                                      |

parameters.name: includeSummary
parameters.description: If true, the response will contain the summary of agent activity metrics for each queue, otherwise not.

messages: user [user_name] does not have access to pbxId [PBX_ID] to make this request.

get.description: This endpoint returns the agent activity metrics for the selected pbx, grouped by agent. The response can be further filtered by a list of queues, sites, agents, user statuses. If no date range is provided, the metrics reflect the agent activity in the last 24 hours.

parameters.name: pbxId
parameters.description: Id of the PBX.

parameters.name: siteIds
parameters.description: Site ids filtering. Multiple values can be passed separated by comma. If not passed, all sites data for the given pbx will be returned.

parameters.name: queueIds
parameters.description: Call Queue ids filtering. Multiple values can be passed separated by comma. If not passed, all queues data for the given pbx will be returned.

parameters.name: userIds
parameters.description: User ids filtering. Multiple values can be passed separated by comma.

parameters.name: userStatuses
parameters.description: User statuses filtering. Multiple values can be passed separated by comma.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Report start date in ISO 8601 standard. If startDate is entered, endDate is required as well.

Start date in U.S. Pacific Time time zon.description: 2023-06-14 start date in U.S. Pacific Time time zone

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Report end date in ISO 8601 standard. If endDate is entered, startDate is required as well.

End date in U.S. Pacific Time time zone.description: 2023-06-15 end date in U.S. Pacific Time time zone

parameters.name: intraDayStart
parameters.description: Report intra day start time (up to seconds) in ISO 8601 standard. If intraDayStart is entered, intraDayEnd is required as well. Report intraDayStart/intraDayEnd parameters should be passed only when report startDate/endDate are passed as well.

intra day start time in U.S. Pacific Tim.description: 8 AM in U.S. Pacific Time time zone

parameters.name: intraDayEnd
parameters.description: Report intra day end time (up to seconds) in ISO 8601 standard. If intraDayEnd is entered, intraDayStart is required as well. Report intraDayStart/intraDayEnd parameters should be passed only when report startDate/endDate are passed as well.

intra day end time in U.S. Pacific Time.description: 6 PM in U.S. Pacific Time time zone

parameters.name: metrics
parameters.description:
Expected metrics in response. Multiple values can be passed separated by comma.

**Values allowed and their description**

| Metric | Description | 
| -------| ----------- | 
| averageOnHoldInteractionsTime      | The average time an interaction spends on hold. |
| enteredInteractions                | The number of interactions entered into the queue. |
| rejectedInteractions               | The number of interactions rejected by the agent. |
| missedInteractions                 | The number of interactions missed by the agent. |
| rejectedInteractionsPercentage     | The percentage of interactions rejected by the agent. |
| acceptedInteractions               | The number of interactions accepted by the agent. |
| acceptedInteractionsPercentage     | The percentage of interactions accepted by the agent. |
| ongoingHandlingInteractions        | The number of interactions currently being handled by the agent. |
| ongoingAvgTalkingInteractionsTime  | The average time of ongoing talking interactions. |
| ongoingAvgHandlingInteractionsTime | The average time of ongoing handling interactions. |
| ongoingOnHoldInteractions          | The number of ongoing interactions currently on hold. |
| ongoingTalkingInteractions         | The number of ongoing talking interactions. |
| averageWrapUpTime                  | The average time taken to wrap up an interaction. |
| missedInteractionsPercentage       | The percentage of interactions missed by the agent. |
| averageTalkingInteractionsTime     | The average time of talking interactions. |
| totalInteractionTime               | The total time spent on interactions. |
| ongoingOnHoldInteractionsTime      | The total time of ongoing interactions currently on hold. |
| ongoingTalkingInteractionsTime     | The total time of ongoing talking interactions. |
| ongoingTotalHandlingInteractionsTime | The total time of ongoing handling interactions. |
| userStatusTime                     | The total time the user has spent in their current status. |
| ongoingWrapUpInteractionsTime      | The total time of ongoing wrap-up interactions. |
| ongoingWrapUpInteractions          | The number of ongoing wrap-up interactions. |

parameters.name: includeSummary
parameters.description: If true, the response will contain the summary of agent activity metrics for each queue, otherwise not.

All Metrics.description: metrics param not passed, all call queue metrics will be returned.

messages: user [user_name] does not have access to pbxId [PBX_ID] to make this request.

get.description: This endpoint returns the call queue metrics, for the selected PBX. The response can be further filtered by a list of queues, sites. If no date range is provided, the metrics reflect the activity on queues in the last 24 hours.

parameters.name: pbxId
parameters.description: Id of the PBX.

parameters.name: siteIds
parameters.description: Site ids filtering. Multiple values can be passed separated by comma. If not passed, all sites data for the given pbx will be returned.

parameters.name: queueIds
parameters.description: Call Queue ids filtering. Multiple values can be passed separated by comma.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Report start date in ISO 8601 standard. If startDate is entered, endDate is required as well.

Start date in U.S. Pacific Time time zon.description: 2023-06-14 start date in U.S. Pacific Time time zone

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Report start date in ISO 8601 standard. If endDate is entered, startDate is required as well.

End date in U.S. Pacific Time time zone.description: 2023-06-15 end date in U.S. Pacific Time time zone

parameters.name: intraDayStart
parameters.description: Report intra day start time (up to seconds) in ISO 8601 standard. If intraDayStart is entered, intraDayEnd is required as well. Report intraDayStart/intraDayEnd parameters should be passed only when report startDate/endDate are passed as well.

intra day start time in U.S. Pacific Tim.description: 8 AM in U.S. Pacific Time time zone

parameters.name: intraDayEnd
parameters.description: Report intra day end time (up to seconds) in ISO 8601 standard. If intraDayEnd is entered, intraDayStart is required as well. Report intraDayStart/intraDayEnd parameters should be passed only when report startDate/endDate are passed as well.

intra day end time in U.S. Pacific Time.description: 6 PM in U.S. Pacific Time time zone

parameters.name: metrics
parameters.description:
Expected metrics in response. Multiple values can be passed separated by comma.

**Values allowed and their description**

| Metric | Description |
| ---------------- | ------------|
| abandonedInHandlingCalls | The total number of handling interactions that ended up as being hung up by the customer |
| abandonedInHandlingCallsPercentage | The total number of handling calls that ended up as being hung up by the customer over the number of entered calls |
| abandonedInWaitingCalls | The total number of waiting interactions that ended up as being hung up by the customer |
| abandonedInWaitingCallsPercentage | The total number of waiting calls that ended up as being hung up by the customer over the number of entered calls |
| acceptedCalls | The total number of interactions answered by agents in the queue |
| acceptedCallsPercentage | The total number of calls answered over the number of entered calls |
| activeCalls | The number of calls still active at the end of the selected interval |
| averageAnswerTime | Average time taken to answer a call after ringing begins |
| averageHandlingTime | Average handling time for interactions in the specified time frame |
| averageOnHoldTime | Average on hold time for finished calls |
| averageTalkTime | Average talk time in the specified time frame |
| averageTimeToAnswer | The average time agents take to answer calls (alerting duration) |
| averageWaitingTime | Average waiting time for interactions in the specified time frame |
| completedCalls | The number of calls completed at the end of the selected interval |
| enteredCalls | The total number of interactions that entered the queue |
| forwardedToVoiceMail | The total number of interactions that were forwarded to voice mail |
| longestHandlingTime | Longest handling time for interactions in the specified time frame |
| longestOnHoldTime | Longest on hold time for finished calls |
| longestTalkTime | Longest talk time in the specified time frame |
| longestWaitingTime | Longest waiting time for interactions in the specified time frame |
| ongoingAvailableAgents | Number of users assigned to the queue, logged in and in the Available status |
| ongoingAvgHandlingTime | Average handling time |
| ongoingAvgTalkingTime | Average talking time |
| ongoingAvgWaitingTime | Average waiting time |
| ongoingEligibleAgents | The number of primary and secondary users in the statuses: Available, Busy, Away, Appear Offline |
| ongoingEligibleOverflowAgents | The number of secondary users in the statuses: Available, Busy, Away, Appear Offline |
| ongoingEligiblePrimaryAgents | The number of primary users in the statuses: Available, Busy, Away, Appear Offline |
| ongoingEnabledOverflowAgents | Number of enabled overflow agents |
| ongoingEnabledPrimaryAgents | Number of enabled primary agents |
| ongoingHandlingCalls | Handling calls |
| ongoingLoggedOutAndDndAgents | Number of primary and secondary users in statuses: Offline, Logged out, Dnd |
| ongoingLoggedOutAndDndOverflowAgents | Number of secondary users in statuses: Offline, Logged out, Dnd |
| ongoingLongestHandlingTime | Longest handling time |
| ongoingLongestOnHoldTime | Longest on hold time |
| ongoingLongestTalkingTime | Longest talking time |
| ongoingLongestWaitingTime | Longest waiting time |
| ongoingOnHoldCalls | On hold calls |
| ongoingOnHoldTime | On hold time |
| ongoingOverflowAgents | Total number of secondary users assigned to the queue regardless of their available status |
| ongoingOverflowWrappingUpAgents | The number of secondary users in Wrap-up state |
| ongoingPrimaryWrappingUpAgents | The number of primary users in Wrap-up state |
| ongoingTalkingCalls | Talking calls |
| ongoingTalkingTime | Talking time |
| ongoingTotalCalls | Total calls |
| ongoingTotalHandlingTime | Total handling time |
| ongoingWaitingCalls | Waiting calls |
| ongoingWaitingTime | Waiting time |
| ongoingWrappingUpAgents | The number of primary and secondary users in Wrap-up state |
| totalHandlingTime | Total handling time for interactions in the specified time frame |
| totalOnHoldTime | Total on hold time for interactions in the specified time frame |
| totalTalkTime | Total talk time for calls in the specified time frame |
| totalWaitingTime | Total waiting time for interactions in the specified time frame |
| transferredToCallQueue | The total number of interactions that were transferred to a call queue |
| transferredToCallQueuePercentage | The total number of calls that were transferred to a call queue over the number of entered calls |
| transferredToExternalNumber | The total number of interactions that were transferred to an external number |
| transferredToRingGroup | The total number of interactions that were transferred to a ring group |
| transferredToRingGroupPercentage | The total number of calls that were transferred to a ring group over the number of entered calls |

parameters.name: includeSummary
parameters.description: If true, response will contain the metrics summary for the requested queues, otherwise not.

messages: user [user_name] does not have access to pbxId [PBX_ID] to make this request.

get.description: This endpoint returns the summary of calls for selected time period and pbx

parameters.name: pbxId
parameters.description: Id of the PBX.

parameters.name: siteIds
parameters.description: Site ids filtering. Multiple values can be passed separated by comma. If not passed, all sites data for the given pbx will be returned.

parameters.name: queueIds
parameters.description: Call Queue ids filtering. Multiple values can be passed separated by comma.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Report start date in ISO 8601 standard. If startDate is entered, endDate is required as well.

Start date in U.S. Pacific Time time zon.description: 2023-06-14 start date in U.S. Pacific Time time zone

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Report start date in ISO 8601 standard. If endDate is entered, startDate is required as well.

End date in U.S. Pacific Time time zone.description: 2023-06-15 end date in U.S. Pacific Time time zone

parameters.name: intraDayStart
parameters.description: Report intra day start time (up to seconds) in ISO 8601 standard. If intraDayStart is entered, intraDayEnd is required as well. Report intraDayStart/intraDayEnd parameters should be passed only when report startDate/endDate are passed as well.

intra day start time in U.S. Pacific Tim.description: 8 AM in U.S. Pacific Time time zone

parameters.name: intraDayEnd
parameters.description: Report intra day end time (up to seconds) in ISO 8601 standard. If intraDayEnd is entered, intraDayStart is required as well. Report intraDayStart/intraDayEnd parameters should be passed only when report startDate/endDate are passed as well.

intra day end time in U.S. Pacific Time.description: 6 PM in U.S. Pacific Time time zone

parameters.name: metrics
parameters.description:
Expected metrics in response. Multiple values can be passed separated by comma.   
**Values allowed and their description**
| Metric                            | Description                                                                 |
|-----------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| abandonedInHandlingCalls          | Number of calls abandoned during handling                                    |
| abandonedInHandlingCallsPercentage| Percentage of calls abandoned during handling                                |
| abandonedInWaitingCalls           | Number of calls abandoned while waiting                                      |
| abandonedInWaitingCallsPercentage | Percentage of calls abandoned while waiting                                  |
| acceptedCalls                     | Number of calls accepted by agents                                            |
| activeCalls                       | The number of calls still active at the end of the selected interval                                      |
| averageHandlingTime               | Average time spent handling calls                                             |
| averageOnHoldTime                 | Average time callers are on hold                                              |
| averageTalkTime                   | Average duration of talk time per call                                         |
| averageWaitingTime                | Average time callers wait before being answered                              |
| enteredCalls                      | Number of calls entered into the system                                        |
| forwardedToVoiceMail              | Number of calls forwarded to voicemail                                         |
| completedCalls                    | Number of calls successfully completed                                        |
| longestHandlingTime               | Longest time taken to handle a call                                           |
| longestOnHoldTime                 | Longest time a caller was on hold                                              |
| longestTalkTime                   | Longest duration of talk time per call                                         |
| longestWaitingTime                | Longest waiting time before a call is answered                                 |
| missedCalls                       | Number of calls that were missed                                              |
| missedCallsPercentage             | Percentage of missed calls                                                   |
| rejectedCalls                     | Number of calls rejected by agents                                            |
| rejectedCallsPercentage           | Percentage of calls rejected by agents                                         |
| totalHandlingTime                 | Total time spent handling calls                                              |
| totalOnHoldTime                   | Total time callers spent on hold                                               |
| totalTalkTime                     | Total talk time across all calls                                               |
| totalWaitingTime                  | Total waiting time for all calls                                               |
| transferredToCallQueue            | Number of calls transferred to the call queue                                   |
| transferredToExternalNumber       | Number of calls transferred to an external number                               |
| transferredToRingGroup            | Number of calls transferred to a ring group                                      |
| ongoingAvailableAgents            | Number of agents available to take calls                                         |
| ongoingAvgHandlingTime           | Average handling time for ongoing calls                                        |
| ongoingAvgTalkingTime            | Average talk time for ongoing calls                                            |
| ongoingAvgWaitingTime            | Average waiting time for ongoing calls                                         |
| ongoingEligibleAgents            | Number of eligible agents for handling calls                                   |
| ongoingEligibleOverflowAgents    | Number of eligible overflow agents                                            |
| ongoingEligiblePrimaryAgents     | Number of eligible primary agents                                             |
| ongoingEnabledOverflowAgents     | Number of overflow agents currently enabled                                     |
| ongoingEnabledPrimaryAgents      | Number of primary agents currently enabled                                      |
| ongoingHandlingCalls             | Number of calls currently being handled                                        |
| ongoingLoggedOutAndDndAgents      | Number of agents logged out or in Do Not Disturb mode                            |
| ongoingLoggedOutAndDndOverflowAgents | Number of overflow agents logged out or in Do Not Disturb mode               |
| ongoingLongestHandlingTime       | Longest handling time for ongoing calls                                        |
| ongoingLongestOnHoldTime         | Longest hold time for ongoing calls                                             |
| ongoingLongestTalkingTime        | Longest talk time for ongoing calls                                            |
| ongoingLongestWaitingTime        | Longest waiting time for ongoing calls                                         |
| ongoingOnHoldCalls               | Number of calls currently on hold                                              |
| ongoingOnHoldTime                | Total on-hold time for ongoing calls                                            |
| ongoingOverflowAgents            | Number of overflow agents available                                             |
| ongoingOverflowWrappingUpAgents  | Number of overflow agents wrapping up calls                                     |
| ongoingPrimaryWrappingUpAgents   | Number of primary agents wrapping up calls                                      |
| ongoingTalkingCalls              | Number of calls currently being talked to                                       |
| ongoingTalkingTime               | Total talk time for ongoing calls                                               |
| ongoingTotalAgents               | Total number of agents currently active                                         |
| ongoingTotalCalls                | Total number of ongoing calls                                                   |
| ongoingTotalHandlingTime         | Total handling time for ongoing calls                                           |
| ongoingWaitingCalls              | Number of calls currently waiting                                               |
| ongoingWaitingTime               | Total waiting time for ongoing calls                                            |
| ongoingWrappingUpAgents          | Number of agents currently wrapping up calls                                    |

messages: user [user_name] does not have access to pbxId [PBX_ID] to make this request.

get.description: This endpoint returns the journey of a single interaction in the specified timeframe.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Report start date in ISO 8601 standard. If startDate is entered, endDate is required as well.

Start date in U.S. Pacific Time time zon.description: 2023-06-14 start date in U.S. Pacific Time time zone

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Report start date in ISO 8601 standard. If endDate is entered, startDate is required as well.

End date in U.S. Pacific Time time zone.description: 2023-06-15 end date in U.S. Pacific Time time zone

messages: user [user_name] does not have access to pbxId [PBX_ID] to make this request.

messages.description: List of business service error messages

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return in the response.

startingAfter.description: A cursor for use in pagination. `startingAfter` is an item ID that defines the point from which to start returning results.

latestSortingValue.description: The latest sorting value used to paginate results.

Paging.description: Parameters for controlling pagination in API responses.

example.summary: Example of a pagination request where one wants to paginate obtain 10 calls per page sorted by handling duration, starting after callId  5f6e4a2b9f1a4d5e7c8b1234 which had the handling duration of 45.79

value.summary: Example sorting by handling duration in ascending order

sortingField.description: field on which sorting is done, currently supported are callId,startTime,stopTime,handlingDuration

agentActivity.description: A list of agent activities, including details of each agent's status and performance metrics.

summary.description: A summary of various metrics and statistics related to the agents' activities.

agentExtension.description: The phone extension associated with the agent.

userStatus.description: The overall status of the agent (e.g., OFFLINE, AVAILABLE).

activityStatus.description: The current activity status of the agent (e.g., IDLE, BUSY).

loggedInQueues.description: A list of queues the agent is logged into.

metrics.description: A collection of various metrics related to the agent's performance.

pbx.description: Identifier for the Private Branch Exchange (PBX) system

site.description: Identifier for the site or location

autoLogin.description: If the queue is autologin or not

extension.description: Extension number associated with the queue

sequence.description: Sequence number of the call status

statusEnterTime.description: Time when the call entered the current status

statusDuration.description: Duration the call has been in the current status

reference.description: originating extension in case of a transferred calls

rootCallId.description: parent call id for consultation calls

did.description: Direct inward dialing number associated with the call

direction.description: Direction of the call (e.g., INTERNAL, EXTERNAL)

address.description: Address or extension number of the callee

deviceId.description: Unique identifier of the device used by the caller (if available)

deviceModel.description: Model of the device used by the callee (if available)

address.description: Address or extension number of the caller

deviceId.description: Unique identifier of the device used by the caller

deviceModel.description: Model of the device used by the caller

pbx.description: The PBX (Private Branch Exchange) identifier associated with the queue.

site.description: The site or location where the queue is based.

queueExtension.description: The phone extension associated with the queue.

autoLogin.description: Indicates if agents are automatically logged into the queue.

queueAgentActivity.description: A list of agent activities within the queue.

summary.description: A summary of various metrics and statistics related to the queue's performance.

agentExtension.description: The phone extension associated with the agent.

queueStatus.description: The current status of the agent within the queue (e.g., AVAILABLE_IDLE, BUSY).

userStatus.description: The overall status of the agent (e.g., OFFLINE, AVAILABLE).

overflowAgent.description: Indicates if the agent is an overflow agent for the queue.

metrics.description: A collection of various metrics related to the agent's performance within the queue.

queuesAgentActivity.description: A list of queue activities, including details of each queue and associated agent activities.
